results.overview: When an armed, masked gang enter a Manhattan bank, lock the doors and take hostages, the detective assigned to effect their release enters negotiations preoccupied with corruption charges he is facing.
results.title: Inside Man

results.overview: An NYPD hostage negotiator teams up with a federal agent to rescue dozens of tourists held hostage during a 10-hour seige at the U.S. Federal Reserve.
results.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted

results.overview: Tara again displays her smarts when she discovers Eve's true identity and motive; Webb falls for Lance's ruse hook, line, and sinker.
results.title: The Wrong Inside Man

results.overview: A detective tracking a stolen gem begins to suspect there's more to the case than just theft.
results.title: The Man Inside

results.original_title: Inside 'The Man with the Golden Gun'
results.overview: A behind the scenes look at the James Bond film "The Man with the Golden Gun"
results.title: Inside 'The Man with the Golden Gun'

results.overview: A thriller centered on a young boxer trying to distance himself from his father's gangster past and the relationship with his trainer.
results.title: The Man Inside

results.overview: Years after Barry Thornton disappears from Panama while under suspicion of stealing American defense plans for the canal, his daughter Eleanor, now the ward of Barry's twin brother Dana, is still obsessed with the mystery. Senator Carew informs her that he has solved it, but he is murdered before he can give her the details.
results.title: The Man Inside

results.overview: Gunter Wallraff is a journalist seeking to expose the unethical journalism practiced by The Standard, a very popular and powerful German newspaper. He goes undercover, using forged identity papers and at great personal risk, to join their staff. Once there, he sees how they don't just report the news, but manufacture it to suit the personal political agenda of the paper's leaders.
results.title: The Man Inside

results.overview: In 1981, after the successful test of a submarine tracker device developed by the Swedish scientist Paul Mandell and sponsored by the US government through his representative Miller, his industry is totally burned and the laser device is stolen. Stig Larsson from the Swedish Secret Agency suspects of an inside job and brings the Swedish Marine Thomas Kallin to investigate Paul undercover as his driver. The naive Kallin is double-crossed but continues his investigation while Larsson finds the truth about the heist.
results.title: The Inside Man

results.original_title: Who’s That Man Inside My House?
results.title: Who’s That Man Inside My House?

results.overview: A DVD Special Feature documentary on the experience of turning the chilling novel "Red Dragon" into a motion picture, all told through the actors and director of the first interpretation on film of the hideously complex Hannibal Lecter. Features interviews with Director Michael Mann, and actors Brian Cox, William Petersen, Tom Noonan, and Joan Allen.
results.title: Inside 'Manhunter'

results.overview: Through sacrifice, hard work, and a knack for passing on his wisdom, Leonard Padilla has earned the title "Godfather of Bail." Leonard's best protégé and now partner Rob Dick takes his knowledge to Reno, Nevada.
results.title: National Geographic Inside: Manhunt

results.overview: The incredible, behind the scenes, true story and exclusive footage of the most dangerous white gang of the 20th century. No actors, no recreations, just you, your personal guide Robert Hendrickson, The MANSON Gang and the most notorious living gangster in American history.
results.title: Inside The Manson Gang

results.overview: Dong-hyun is a high school student. One day, he falls from the rooftop and bumps into Pan-soo who is a passerby. Pan-soo is a member of a criminal organization. When the two men wake up in the hospital, they discover that they have switched bodies.
results.title: The Dude in Me

results.original_title: Inside the Manson Cult: The Lost Tapes
results.overview: Culled from more than 100 hours of new and archival interviews with former Manson cult members, this two-hour special goes inside Spahn’s Ranch, where the Manson cult lived, to offer an intimate and terrifying look into America’s most murderous group.
results.title: Inside the Manson Cult: The Lost Tapes

results.original_title: The Family: Inside the Manson Cult
results.overview: This film looks back at the twisted world of hate, fear, sexual transgression and mind-control of one of the world's most notorious villain's, Charles Manson. He once had dreams of a Hollywood recording career. Fame was elusive, so he chose infamy. This is the story of how one man transformed a harmless group of hippies into a gang of brutal murderers. What evil lurked in this strange man's heart?
results.title: The Family: Inside the Manson Cult
